Token.Abstract: < Peform saves synchronously, blocking execution on the current thread until the save is complete
Asynchronously save changes in the current context and it's parent

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block that is called after the save has completed. The block is passed a success state as a BOOL and an NSError instance if an error occurs. Always called on the main queue.

Token.Abstract: Asynchronously save changes in the current context all the way back to the persistent store

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block that is called after the save has completed. The block is passed a success state as a BOOL and an NSError instance if an error occurs. Always called on the main queue.

Token.Abstract: Synchronously save changes in the current context and it's parent
Synchronously save changes in the current context all the way back to the persistent store
Save the current context with options

Parameter.Name: mask
Parameter.Abstract: bitmasked options for the save process

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block that is called after the save has completed. The block is passed a success state as a BOOL and an NSError instance if an error occurs. Always called on the main queue.

Token.Abstract: Synchronously save changes in the current context all the way back to the persistent store
Synchronously save changes in the current context all the way back to the persistent store

Parameter.Name: errorCallback
Parameter.Abstract: Block that is called if an error is encountered while saving. Always called on the main thread. \deprecated
